CustomField.description: This is the role the person serves, not necessarily what their title states. This helps us refine marketing campaigns and sales efforts better where titles may be unique. If you're not sure what to put, each out to your Salesforce Admin.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the role the person serves, not necessarily what their title states. This helps us refine marketing campaigns and sales efforts better where titles may be unique. If you're not sure what to put, each out to your Salesforce Admin.
CustomField.label: Role
